page.title: 06SANDERS PARK, BROMSGROVE-2
page.content: At Sanders Park there is a Trim Trail. The{Trim Trail}is scattered all around the park. In the Trim Trail there are many different exercises, like walking along thin planks and doing chin ups where you hold on to a bar and lift your chin over it. There are 20 different exercises at Sanders, which are really good. Sanders park is often used to finish races, like a cycle race which was held in the February half term. After the{Carnival}in Bromsgrove there is a fete in Sanders Park.There were lots of games and people could try pottery making. There were folk singers and pony rides. You could buy all sorts of things from stalls. Altogether it was a lot of fun and excitement.
